name: Switch CTRL
description:
This was done as a submission for GeoJam 2021.

This is the first ever game I have ever created, so I do apologize in advance for this tragedy. I would have loved to have implemented more features to the game, but I just knew the deadline would mean that I would only be able to get the bare minimum done. And even that was a struggle, as I was learning as I was going along.

I would be happy to improve on this game later down the line, but for now I think it is an okay go for my first ever try at C#, and game development in general.

Upcoming Features

The following features could be added to the game:

  • 50 to 100 levels?
  • Special event levels? i.e. Christmas, Halloween shapes etc.
  • Robots breaking? i.e. Click and hold for 2-3 secs to fix.
  • Speed rounds?
Assets Used

The following assets were used in the making of this game:

  • Kenney's Game Icons Pack.
  • Kenney's Fonts Pack.
  • Kenney's UI Pack.
  • Kenney's Interface Sounds.
  • Kenney's UI Audio.
  • Kenney's Robot Pack.
  • Icoso's "Wish I Had It" Soundtrack.
